alert.note: Alert for San Francisco River Valley; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 10:42PM MST until January 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches below 7500 feet and 4 to 8 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...San Francisco River Valley and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: San Francisco River Valley; Southwest Mountains
